summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Amherst Addition; Southwest Quarter of Section 1, Township 26 North, Range 3 East, W.M.,; L.M. Collins Donation Claim No. 46; Southwest Quarter of Section 21, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; and vacated E. Galer St. adjoining replat of John J. McGilvra's Third Addition.
